title: Draft an Internal Audit Report
description: An audit manager needs to draft the final report for a marketing expenses audit.

tasks.description: Compile all documented findings from the audit workpapers.
tasks.expected_outcome: All approved findings are gathered for inclusion in the report.

tasks.description: Write the executive summary, including the overall audit rating (e.g., 'Satisfactory') and a summary of key findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: A concise and impactful executive summary is written.

tasks.description: Send the draft report to the Director of Marketing for their review and to provide management responses to the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The draft report is formally issued to the auditee for their response.
